issue.title: [JS] Ensure reader and writer support files and streams with no RecordBatches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Re: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2119 and <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3871>, the JS reader and writer should support files and streams with a Schema but no RecordBatches.
